EmailTemplate.subject: Livongo Intro/Year One ROI Case Study
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Morning {!Contact.FirstName},
Hi Shara,
These messages are always fun for me to send. As Livongo continues to serve more of the population (now over 76,000 members using our diabetes solution) we've conducted more studies demonstrating the results our clients have been hoping for.
I’m excited to share our latest case study that shows how Livongo helped Dean Foods achieve a positive Year-1 ROI of 1.4x on their investment in Livongo with $70 per participant per month cost savings. People on the Livongo program achieved a 5 percent medical savings while people who were not on Livongo program had a 7 percent increase in costs. While we expect costs savings in three years, we’re thrilled we achieved this in one year. See the full study here.
I’d love to further discuss how Livongo can drive these types of results for with your clients.
Thank you,
Perry Broeseker Regional Director, Southeast Livongo m: 727.631.5347 e: pbroeseker@livongo.com www.livongo.com
